news.title: Trump calls on House Republicans to vote to release Epstein files
news.summary: "We have nothing to hide," Trump writes on Truth Social, after previously fighting a proposal to make more of the Epstein files public.

news.title: Fast-track deportations to be announced as part of asylum reforms
news.summary: Plans to end multiple appeals against removal and speed up deportations are expected to be unveiled.

news.title: Two US marines implicated in killing family in notorious Iraq war shooting, expert tells BBC
news.summary: New evidence raises doubts about the longest US war crimes investigation of the Iraq war and how US forces are held to account.

news.title: Keyless car theft devices used by criminals sell for Â£20k online
news.summary: It is not illegal currently to own the gadgets but the government has promised to ban them.

news.title: China's investment spree in UK gave it access to military-grade technology, BBC told
news.summary: Tens of billions of pounds has been spent by the Chinese in the UK since 2000, Panorama has learned.

news.title: Mysterious drones have been spotted at airports across Europe. How worried should we be?
news.summary: Drones have been found across Western Europe near airports, military bases and power plants, as part of a suspected programme of 'hybrid warfare'

news.title: Pauline Quirke's family on her dementia: 'She's still funny and recognises us'
news.summary: The family of the Birds of a Feather actress say "she's still funny, she's talking, she's happy".

news.title: Criminals buy haulage firms to steal lorryloads of goods, BBC finds
news.summary: These tactics and others, such as raids on lorries stopped in traffic, are driving a freight-crime surge.

news.title: Cold snap brings chance of snow for some as flood clear-up continues
news.summary: Storm Claudia moved away on Sunday after delivering over a month's worth of rain to parts of England and Wales.

news.title: Three things you can do if your child's friends annoy you
news.summary: It's tempting to tell your child they can't hang out with a friend, but that often won't solve the problem.
